modName: Craftable Crossbows and Bolts for all
summary: Makes the crossbows and bolts craftable regardless of which faction you belong to in the new DLC: Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7bMFf.png[/img]
[u]Description[/u]
I find the crossbow to be the best addition to the game, however I chose Vampire Lord faction which means that crossbows and bolts are not craftable for me. This is just a simple fix.

What this mod does is it makes the crossbows and bolts craftable regardless of which faction you belong to in the new DLC: Dawnguard. The perk requirements are still in effect, so you will need the Steel Smithing perk to be able to craft the Steel Crossbow and etc. Also you are not required to use the forge in the Dawnguard's headquarters.

[u]Requirements[/u]
-DLC: Dawnguard
